label.description: a label used a the creation of the invoice to get a specific invoice

invstring.description: the string value to query a specific invoice

payment_hash.description: a payment_hash of the invoice to get the details of a specific invoice

offer_id.description: a local `offer_id` the invoice was issued for a specific invoice details

index.description: if neither *in_channel* nor *out_channel* is specified, it controls ordering. Defaults to `created`

start.description: if `index` is specified, `start` may be specified to start from that value, which is generally returned from lightning-wait(7)

limit.description: if `index` is specified, `limit` can be used to specify the maximum number of entries to return
